Articles.Content:
On most of the capsules they have working rear hatches like this...

But the Mk1 cockpit's doesn't seem to work...

Deliberate or a bug?

Edited November 14, 2015 by Foxster
More like an omission, theres no hatch transform on the back of that cockpit, and it's not unique to the Mk1, both of the Mk2 cockpits and the Mk2 crew cabin also lack hatches on their ends.

This is beyond what I can do, but it seems that it could be fixed with a simple ModuleManager patch to add it.

Or, maybe another "silent update"?
Not as simple as a MM patch, crew hatches are defined by transforms in the model itself.

Not as simple as a MM patch, crew hatches are defined by transforms in the model itself.

oh. bummer
This poses a philosophical conundrum, if a feature doesn't exist on a part, can it really be broken?

[quote name='sal_vager']This poses a philosophical conundrum, if a feature doesn't exist on a part, can it really be broken?[/QUOTE]

Not broken, just incomplete. Depending on the definition of incomplete, it could then be broken.
